seedGroups.name: Beaks
seedGroups.description: Beaks are a subset of the shaker group, with seed capsules that split open like a beak when the seeds are ripe. Collect when beaks are open.

species.description: Beaks. The follicles (seed capsules) look somewhat like the flower, but upside down. Collect when beaks open to reveal the oil-black seeds. Follicles will turn colors too, but the open beak is more important. Flowers are a bold red and yellow. Short-lived perennial.
